summary: Defines Flask view functions that expose a RESTful API for managing user accounts, including retrieving account details, timelines, statistics, notification preferences, updating balances, configuring Telegram integration, and handling innopoints reclamation.
business_intent: Enable authenticated users and administrators to view and modify account-related data, control notification settings, adjust point balances, and process point reclamation through a set of HTTP endpoints, supporting the platform's user account and reward management workflows.
